name: At-Will
description: These abilities can be used as often as desired, with no rest needed to perform the attack again.

name: EOT
description: Every Other Turn. These abilities can be used once every other turn, meaning they can be used on your turn, but not on the next turn.

name: Scene
description: These abilities can be used X (1 if not specified) times per scene. If they can be used multiple times in a single scene, they are also considered EOT.

name: Daily
description: These abilities can be used X (1 if not specified) times per day. Even if they have multiple daily uses, they can only be used once per scene.

name: Static
description: The effect is always granted to the user.
